hero.description: PT. Sukses Ekspor Mandiri provides premium Robusta and Arabica green beans sourced directly from Indonesia's finest coffee-producing regions. Competitive pricing with reliable quality.

about.desc1: As a direct sourcing company based in Indonesia, PT. Sukses Ekspor Mandiri provides Robusta and Arabica green beans from farming communities across Indonesia's most productive coffee regions. We are committed to delivering authentic Indonesian coffee at competitive prices for your business.
about.desc2: Our team works closely with local producers, ensuring every batch of green beans meets the quality standards your market demands.

product.description: Indonesia is one of the world's top coffee-producing countries, known for its volcanic soil and ideal growing conditions across diverse regions from Sumatra to Java.
product.custom_grading_desc: We can accommodate specific screen size, moisture content, and defect count requirements based on your market needs. Contact us to discuss your specifications.

process.description: A streamlined process designed for efficiency and transparency.
process.step1_desc: Share your requirements — origin, grade, volume, and destination. We respond within 24 hours.
process.step2_desc: Receive a competitive quote with transparent pricing. Request samples to evaluate quality firsthand.
process.step3_desc: Confirm your order. We handle sourcing, quality control, grading, and documentation.
process.step4_desc: Your coffee ships from Indonesian ports with full tracking. FOB and CIF terms available.

trust.description: We build lasting partnerships through accountability, quality, and customer-focused service.
trust.item1_desc: We are committed to conducting every business process with transparency, integrity, and professionalism. Our operations are built on honesty, clear communication, and technical competence to ensure long-term trust with every partner.
trust.item2_desc: Our products are sourced and processed with a strong focus on quality consistency and environmentally responsible practices. We support sustainable agriculture and production methods to ensure long-term value for both our partners and the environment.
trust.item3_desc: Our supply chain and documentation processes are fully prepared to support international trade requirements. From quality control to logistics coordination, every stage is structured to meet global standards and buyer specifications.
trust.item4_desc: We adapt to each customer's specific needs, including packaging, specifications, and order volumes. Our goal is to provide practical solutions that support smooth transactions and long-term business relationships.

contact.description: Whether you're sourcing Indonesian coffee for the first time or looking for a reliable supply partner, we'd love to hear from you. Share your requirements and our team will prepare a tailored proposal.
contact.placeholder_message: Tell us about your coffee requirements — origin, grade, volume, etc.
contact.toast_desc: Thank you! Our team will respond within 24 hours.

footer.company: PT. Sukses Ekspor Mandiri — Direct Coffee Sourcing, Indonesia
footer.rights: © {{year}} PT. Sukses Ekspor Mandiri. All rights reserved.
